front.title: Color Operation with BGP Label Unicast

abstract.t: This document specifies how to carry colored path advertisementvia an enhancement to the existing protocol BGP Label Unicast. It wouldallow backward compatibility with RFC8277. The targeted solution is to use stack of labels advertised viaBGP Label Unicast 2.0 for end to end traffic steering across multiple IGP domains.The operation is similar to Segment Routing. This proposed protocol will convey the necessary reachabilityinformation to the ingress PE node to construct an end to end path
